src:
V Slovenijo hotela pretihotapiti več ilegalcev
Trije Pakistanci so se skrili med tovor.
04 Nov 2019, 20:11 by T. V.
DOLŽ – Pretekli konec tedna so policisti PU Novo mesto med varovanjem državne meje prijeli dva tihotapca ljudi in več tujcev.V nedeljo okoli 12. ure so v bližini kraja Dolž izsledili in prijeli šest tujcev, ki so nezakonito prestopili državno mejo. Pri izvajanju aktivnosti v širši okolici so izsledili in prijeli tudi državljana (34) Srbije, ki je tujce z osebnim avtomobilom nameraval prepeljati v notranjost države. Zasegli so mu avtomobil, mu odvzeli prostost, s kazensko ovadbo pa ga bodo zaradi prepovedanega prehajanja meje privedli k preiskovalnemu sodniku. Policijski postopki s štirimi državljani Palestine, državljanom Iraka in državljanom Sirije še potekajo.V noči na ponedeljek pa je na mejni prehod Obrežje na vstop v Slovenijo pripeljal voznik (34) škode superb slovenskih registrskih oznak. Policisti so med pregledom vozila v prtljažniku našli skrita dva državljana Afganistana, ki sta se poskušala izogniti mejni kontroli. Vozniku iz BiH so odvzeli prostost, ga pridržali in mu zasegli avtomobil. S kazensko ovadbo ga bodo privedli k preiskovalnemu sodniku, državljana Afganistana pa bodo predali hrvaškim varnostnim organom.
Pakistanci skriti med tovorom
Okoli 22. ure je na mejni prehod Obrežje na vstop v Slovenijo pripeljal voznik tovornega vozila registrskih oznak Severne Makedonije. Policisti so opravili mejno kontrolo in pregled tovornega vozila, kjer so med tovorom našli skrite tri državljane Pakistana. Po zaključenem postopku so jih predali hrvaškim varnostnim organom.
text:
He wanted to smuggle more illegals into Slovenia
Three Pakistanis hid in a cargo.
04 Nov 2019, 20:11 by T.V.
DOLZ - Last weekend, police officers in Novo mesto police detained two human smugglers and several foreigners while protecting the state border. On Sunday, around 12 noon, six foreigners who illegally crossed the state border were tracked down and arrested. While conducting activities in the wider area, they also tracked down and arrested a citizen (34) of Serbia who intended to transport foreigners by car to the interior of the country. They seized his car, confiscated him and, with a criminal complaint, will bring him to an investigating magistrate due to the illegal crossing of the border. Police proceedings are ongoing with four Palestinian, Iraqi and Syrian citizens. On Monday night, a driver (34) of damage to superb Slovenian license plates was brought to the Obrezje border crossing. During a search of the vehicle, police officers found two Afghan nationals in the trunk trying to evade border controls. The BiH driver was arrested, detained and his car seized. They will bring him to an investigating magistrate and hand him over to the Croatian security authorities.
Pakistanis hidden during cargo
Around 10 pm, a driver of a truck of registration plates of Northern Macedonia was brought to the border crossing Obrežje. Police officers carried out a border check and inspection of a lorry, where three Pakistan nationals were found hidden in the cargo. After the procedure was completed, they were handed over to the Croatian security authorities.
